law.catch_line: County judge/executive to fix hours of operation.
law.text: The county judge/executive shall, by an order entered in his order book, fix reasonable hours of operation for places of entertainment throughout the county.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 367, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1599f-8.
